name: Timeline
description: Timeline visualizes a series of chained events.

value.label: value
value.title: An array of events to display.

align.label: align
align.title: Position of the timeline bar relative to the content. Valid values are "left", "right" and "alternate" for vertical layout and "top", "bottom" for horizontal layout.

layout.label: layout
layout.title: Orientation of the timeline, valid values are "vertical" and "horizontal".

data-key.label: dataKey
data-key.title: Name of the field that uniquely identifies the a record in the data.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

slots.name: opposite
slots.title: Custom content for the content to be placed at the other side of the bar
